content: Yes, I mean, as you know, we’re always looking given our track record and acquisitions, we’re always looking for accretive add bolt-ons, I think, just look at the impact that Knight Capital the small secured business like down in Florida acquired, they crushed it with a overlay of technology on our SBA business for PPP, and now that’s going, that investment will then be levered into more technology affinity based expansion of the SBA business, so it’s similar in the commercial side, we’re looking I’d say two silos. But from my perspective, it’s, we always said at some point where we’re going to undertake as the SBA business achieve greater volumes, and we have strong coverage of cordings from our capital intensive SBC business, that we would look to extend the duration of our cash flow stream and the SBA business by instead of selling, let’s say at a 13 point premium for a hundred fifth strip, maybe sell it par for 200 basis points strip.
